    O2DES Studio

    A powerful web-based discrete event simulation modeling and visualization tool built with Next.js.
    Get Started Components

    Features

    mindmap
  root((O2DES Studio))
    Simulation
      Real-time execution
      Custom nodes
      Data visualization
    Editor
      Drag & drop
      Multi-select
      Undo/redo
    Integration
      Data import/export
      API support
      Extensions
    Analysis
      Statistics
      Reports
      Charts

    Quick Links

    • Architecture Overview
    • Component Documentation
    • Getting Started Guide

    Why O2DES Studio?

    Powerful Simulation Engine

    Built on top of the O2DES framework, providing robust discrete event simulation capabilities with:

    • Custom node types
    • Real-time execution
    • Configurable parameters
    • Data visualization

    Modern Web Interface

    graph LR
    A[Intuitive UI] --> B[React Components]
    B --> C[Next.js Framework]
    C --> D[TypeScript]
    • Responsive design
    • Dark/light themes
    • Keyboard shortcuts
    • Touch support

    Developer Friendly

    • TypeScript support
    • Component-based architecture
    • Extensible plugin system
    • Comprehensive documentation

    Getting Started

    # Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/o2des-studio.git

# Install dependencies
cd o2des-studio
npm install

# Start development server
npm run dev

    Visit Getting Started for detailed instructions.
